issue.title: Unable to fetch from SRCSim repo

content.raw:
Thanks @nkoenig. Ssrcsim is not a problem as it can be compiled from source, but other packages that srcsim depends upon are missing. Few of those packages are :
- nasa-indigo-workspace
- robonet-tools
- val-description
- val-controller-manager
- val-gazebo          
- nasa-common-logging
- robot-variable-smt
- val-deploy
- val-robot-interface

Is there a way to get access to those packages?
content.html:
Thanks @nkoenig. Ssrcsim is not a problem as it can be compiled from source, but other packages that srcsim depends upon are missing. Few of those packages are : - nasa-indigo-workspace - robonet-tools - val-description - val-controller-manager - val-gazebo
- nasa-common-logging - robot-variable-smt - val-deploy - val-robot-interface

Is there a way to get access to those packages?
